affiliations.name: SAMARTH SWARUP, is a Research Associate Professor in the Biocomplexity Institute & Initiative at the University of Virginia. He holds a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. His research interests include large-scale social simulation using synthetic populations, human behavior modeling, and simulation analytics. His email address is, swarup@virginia.edu, .
